Articles.Content:
Hi everyone.... The flood of mods and the sometimes unclear info if they are working with 1.02 makes my head hurt.

Can some please list me which Mod workin with 1.02 for Visula enhancement?

Thank you.

Look here and scroll to the end of the post: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55401-Community-Mods-and-Plugins-Library](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55401-Community-Mods-and-Plugins-Library)
Which side? First one? Last one?
The first post in the thread. There are about a dozen or so visual mods listed near the end of that post.
Yep, when asking about mods, the modding subforums are the place to go. And it looks like that thread \*Aqua\* linked is being kept up to date.
